full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 58 of 247 186 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - cross 1 Q. And from 2000 onwards or till 2004 or five, you were flying both the Gulfstream and the Boeing? A. That's correct. Q. Now, in the period from 1991, when you were first hired, to 2005, you flew numerous flights for Epstein? A. Correct. Q. Would it be accurate to say that you flew over 1,000 flights during that time period? A. I'd have to look at my records, but it was probably close to that, yes. Q. Give or take? A. Give or take, yes. Q. That's a lot of flights. A. We consider it more in hours than flights, but -- Q. Understood. And Epstein would frequently have other passengers on these flights, right? A. Yes. Q. And many of these passengers were female; correct? A. Correct. Q. And sometimes you saw the passengers, right? A. Yes. Q. There were times when you, I think, stood at the entrance of the plane near the cockpit when the passengers arrived and you might have greeted them? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017420

1 Q. And from 2000 onwards or till 2004 or five, you were flying both the Gulfstream and the Boeing? A. That's correct. Q. Now, in the period from 1991, when you were first hired, to 2005, you flew numerous flights for Epstein? A. Correct. Q. Would it be accurate to say that you flew over 1,000 flights during that time period? A. I'd have to look at my records, but it was probably close to that, yes. Q. Give or take? A. Give or take, yes. Q. That's a lot of flights. A. We consider it more in hours than flights, but -- Q. Understood. And Epstein would frequently have other passengers on these flights, right? A. Yes. Q. And many of these passengers were female; correct? A. Correct. Q. And sometimes you saw the passengers, right? A. Yes. Q. There were times when you, I think, stood at the entrance of the plane near the cockpit when the passengers arrived and you might have greeted them?
